summary.incident:
Sergio Akieme (Reims) is cautioned by the
referee for a foul that he committed a little
earlier.

Ange Tia (Reims) receives a killer pass,
finds himself one-on-one with the goalkeeper
and scores with aplomb into the top right
corner. What a perfect shot.

It's time for a substitution. Papa Amadou
Diallo (Metz) comes on in place of Kevin
Van Den Kerkhof.

Stephane Le Mignan is forced to make a change.
Jessy Deminguet (Metz) is not able to carry
on due to injury. He is replaced by Alpha
Toure.

Ange Tia (Reims) is punished with a yellow
card for violating the rules.

Substitution. Amadou Kone leaves the pitch
and is replaced by Valentin Atangana Edoa
(Reims).

Mamadou Diakhon (Reims) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Ange Tia.

Stephane Le Mignan prepares a substitution.
Morgan Bokele Mputu is replaced by Idrissa
Gueye (Metz).

Substitution. Oumar Diakite is replaced
by Jordan Siebatcheu (Reims).

Today's match ends for Buta who will be
replaced by Sekine Hiroki (Reims).

Mory Gbane (Reims) is being substituted
because of an injury. Samba Diawara sends
John Joe Patrick Finn on the pitch.

It's a goal! Matthieu Udol (Metz) displays
superb quick feet and dribbling as he jinks
his way through multiple challenges and
takes a shot from inside the box, which
is deflected and goes past stranded Yehvann
Diouf. 1:1.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Ablie Jallow (Metz) is replacing Cheikh
Sabaly.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Urie-Michel Mboula (Metz) was quite harsh
and Eric Wattellier didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Keito Nakamura (Reims) is booked for saying
more than Eric Wattellier was willing to
tolerate.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Maxime Colin (Metz) comes
onto the pitch for Koffi Kouao.

Substitution. Nhoa Sangui (Reims) in, Sergio
Akieme out.

Goal! Gauthier Hein plays a pass to the
feet of Alpha Toure (Metz), and he shoots
into the bottom right corner from inside
the box. It's 1:2.

Gauthier Hein (Metz) receives a brilliant
pass and sends a long-range shot past the
helpless goalkeeper. What a cracking goal!

Gauthier Hein (Metz) gets booked for the
first time in this match.

summary.incident:
Hakim Ben El Hadj Salem shows a yellow card
to Valentin Atangana (Reims) for a tough
tackle.

GOAL! The corner comes over and Cheikh Sabaly
wins a simple header before Matthieu Udol
(Metz) nods the ball into the back of the
net. 1:0.

Half-time substitution. Samba Diawara decided
to make a change. Valentin Atangana Edoa
is replaced by Amadou Kone (Reims).

Half-time substitution. John Joe Patrick
Finn is replaced by Oumar Diakite (Reims).

Cedric Kipre (Reims) celebrates a beautiful
goal. He wins the ball inside the box from
the free kick and plants a header inside
the left post. 1:1.

Mory Gbane (Reims) is awarded a yellow card
for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree
with the decision, but Hakim Ben El Hadj
Salem ignores the protests.

Cedric Kipre (Reims) attempts to discuss
the decision with Hakim Ben El Hadj Salem,
but he soon realises that it's not the right
thing to do as he sees the yellow.

Substitution. Ange Tia makes his way off
the pitch and Gabriel Moscardo (Reims) comes
on as his replacement.

Samba Diawara decides to make a substitution.
Jordan Siebatcheu will be replaced by Hafiz
Ibrahim (Reims).

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Morgan Bokele Mputu walks off the pitch
to be replaced by Papa Amadou Diallo (Metz).

Stephane Le Mignan has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Idrissa Gueye (Metz) replacing
Kevin Van Den Kerkhof.

That will be all from Cheikh Sabaly who
is being replaced by the fresh legs of Alpha
Toure (Metz).

Stephane Le Mignan has decided to substitute
Jessy Deminguet and he is replaced by Ablie
Jallow (Metz).

Hakim Ben El Hadj Salem shows the yellow
card to Sadibou Sane (Metz) for a heavy
challenge.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Keito Nakamura will be replaced by Nhoa
Sangui (Reims).

summary.incident:
Goal â€“ 1:0! Nampalys Mendy sends a precise
lofted pass into the box, Neil El Aynaoui

Andy Diouf feeds the ball through to Anass

4:0!

summary.incident:
What a beautiful moment! Mathias Fernandez-Pardo
(Lille) got to the ball and unleashed a
strong shot from distance. It turned out
to be a good decision as his effort found
its way into the top left corner. Guillaume
Restes just shakes his head in disbelief.
The score changes to 0:1.

Rafik Messali produces a beautiful lofted
cross into the box, where Charlie Cresswell
(Toulouse) rises high to head the ball into
the left side of the goal and beyond the
goalkeeper. He makes it 1:1.

Mitchel Bakker (Lille) displays what a brilliant
free kick master he is, especially from
this distance. He hits the ball very well
and scores with a low shot inside the left
post, leaving the keeper helpless.

That will be all from Rafik Messali who
is being replaced by the fresh legs of Joshua
King (Toulouse).

worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown

due to an offside.

the ball inside the right post. 0:1.

decision as his effort found its way inside
the right post. Benjamin Lecomte just shakes
his head in disbelief. The score changes
to 0:2.

Al Musrati (Monaco) replaces Denis Zakaria.

and Vanderson walks off the pitch to be
replaced by Lucas Michal (Monaco).

Whoa! Such gestures are commonly penalised
and Mathias Fernandez-Pardo (Lille) duly
receives a yellow card.

The referee has issued a yellow card to
Alexsandro (Lille).

Cedric Kipre (Reims) is shown a red card
by the referee for a horror tackle that
simply has no place in football!

GOAL! Thatâ€™s a great strike from the spot
by Arnaud Kalimuendo (Rennes) into the right
of the net, giving goalkeeper Yehvann Diouf
no chance!

Djaoui Cisse (Rennes) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Marc Bollengier had an
easy-decision to make.

The need to improve in the second half has
brought about a change. Oumar Diakite (Reims)
comes off for Valentin Atangana Edoa.

The teams are back out for the second half
and here is a change on the pitch. Samba
Diawara gives a chance to John Joe Patrick
Finn and Amadou Kone (Reims) is off.

Here comes a substitution. Teddy Teuma is
given a rest as he is replaced by Mamadou
Diakhon (Reims).

Habib Beye has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Kazeem Olaigbe (Rennes) replacing
Mousa Tamari.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Seko Fofana trots off the
pitch and is replaced by Ismael Kone (Rennes).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Hafiz Ibrahim (Reims)
will replace Junya Ito.

Samba Diawara has decided to substitute
Nhoa Sangui and he is replaced by Buta (Reims).

Substitution. Lorenz Assignon makes his
way off the pitch and Carlos Andres Gomez
(Rennes) comes on as his replacement.

Marc Bollengier shows a yellow card to Hafiz
Ibrahim (Reims) for his blatant foul.

Hafiz Ibrahim (Reims) makes a bad challenge
and is given a second yellow card which
means he's off.

The foul by Ismaily (Lille) is worthy of
a card and a yellow is duly shown by Romain
Lissorgue.

Christopher Wooh (Rennes) picks up a yellow
card for a foul.

Chuba Akpom (Lille) wastes a huge opportunity
to score from the penalty spot. He attempts
to slot into the bottom left corner, but
Brice Samba pulls off a superb save.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Seko Fofana (Rennes) replaces
Jeremy Jacquet.

A yellow card for a tackle by Djaoui Cisse
(Rennes). Romain Lissorgue doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Celebrations are cut short for Lille as
the referee indicates NO GOAL after the
VAR review shows it was offside!

The substitution is prepared. Osame Sahraoui
(Lille) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Hakon Arnar Haraldsson.

Here comes a substitution. Mousa Tamari
is given a rest as he is replaced by Kyogo
Furuhashi (Rennes).

Habib Beye decides to make a substitution.
Ismael Kone will be replaced by Naouirou
Ahamada (Rennes).

Christopher Wooh (Rennes) receives a red
card after his horrific challenge and is
sent off!

Substitution. Nabil Bentaleb (Lille) receives
a signal from the referee and is now allowed
to enter the pitch as Ngalayel Mukau walks
off.

Bruno Genesio prepares a substitution. Ismaily
is replaced by Gabriel Gudmundsson (Lille).

The game has come to an end for Arnaud Kalimuendo.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Hans Hateboer (Rennes).

Goal! 0:1. The ball rebounds to Nabil Bentaleb
(Lille) after a melee in the box, and he
easily beats the keeper from close range.

Substitution. Djaoui Cisse did his best
and is replaced by Kazeem Olaigbe (Rennes).

Goal! Mitchel Bakker tees up Chuba Akpom
(Lille) inside the box, and he keeps his
cool to find the bottom right corner. 0:2.

A substitution has been made. Chuba Akpom
is replaced by Younes Lachaab (Lille).

Bruno Genesio has decided to make a change.
Andre Gomes (Lille) replaces Ayyoub Bouaddi.

Goal - 0:1! Gaetan Laborde (Nice) gets a
shot away from the edge of the box and scores
into the bottom right corner. Evann Guessand
provided an assist for the goal.

Own goal! Etienne Youte Kinkoue (Le Havre)
suffers a good deal of misfortune as he
accidentally puts a pass from one of the
attacking players into his own net. The
score is 0:2.

Goal! Mahamadou Diawara plays a short, square
pass into the path of Yassine Kechta (Le
Havre), who bends a shot straight into the
bottom right corner to make it 1:2. Fabulous
goal!

The referee demonstrates he won't tolerate
this behaviour. Melvin Bard (Nice) is given
a yellow card.

The game is interrupted. Junior Mwanga (Le
Havre) is given a yellow card. He has to
be more careful now.

The game has come to an end for Mahamadou
Diawara. He has contributed as much as he
could today. He will be replaced by the
fresh legs of Rassoul Ndiaye (Le Havre).

Yassine Kechta (Le Havre) is given a fully
deserved yellow card.

Today's match ends for Ali Abdi who will
be replaced by Sofiane Diop (Nice).

Here's the change. Tom Louchet leaves the
pitch and Tanguy Ndombele (Nice) comes on
as a substitute.

The goal by Nice is DISALLOWED on the advice
of the video assistant referee due to an
offside.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Andre Ayew (Le Havre) comes
onto the pitch for Ahmed Hassan.

Here is a change. Antoine Joujou is going
off and Didier Digard gives the last tactical
orders to Ilyes Housni (Le Havre).

Didier Digard has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Timothee Pembele (Le Havre) replacing
Yassine Kechta.

Substitution. Gaetan Laborde did his best
and is replaced by Jeremie Boga (Nice).

Substitution. Pablo Rosario (Nice) on for
Mohamed-Ali Cho.

Melvin Bard (Nice) seems to have forgotten
that he has already received a yellow card
as he is surprised when the referee shows
him a second one!

Goal! Jeremie Boga provides Sofiane Diop
(Nice) with a nice pass inside the box.
It allows him to finish with a precise effort
into the bottom right corner. 1:3.

Angelo Fulgini (Lens) makes it easy for
the referee to show him a yellow card.

Andrew Omobamidele is being substituted
because of an injury. Liam Rosenior sends
Abakar Sylla (Strasbourg) on the pitch.

Will Still (Lens) gets a yellow card, off
the field.

Deiver Machado (Lens) makes a bad tackle
on his opponent and is angry when the referee
shows him a deserved yellow card.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Angelo Fulgini will be replaced by Jeremy
Agbonifo (Lens).

Liam Rosenior has decided to substitute
Sebastian Nanasi and he is replaced by Dilane
Bakwa (Strasbourg).

Deiver Machado (Lens) must have forgotten
about the first yellow card that he received
because he is shown a second one by the
referee after his bad challenge!

A substitution has been made. Andy Diouf
goes off and Abdulay Juma Bah (Lens) comes
on.

An amazing individual effort from Dilane
Bakwa (Strasbourg) ends with a strike from
inside the penalty area. He sends the ball
precisely into the bottom left corner and
makes it 0:1. Herve Koffi was helpless.

A yellow card is awarded to Neil El Aynaoui
(Lens).

Florian Sotoca goes off the pitch and Wesley
Said (Lens) comes on.

Here is a change. Ruben Aguilar is going
off and Will Still gives the last tactical
orders to Anass Zaroury (Lens).

That's the end of the game for Diego Moreira,
who is replaced by Abdoul Ouattara (Strasbourg).

Today's match ends for Valentin Barco who
will be replaced by Eduard Sobol (Strasbourg).

Felix Lemarechal (Strasbourg) is literally
asking for a yellow card with his behaviour.
The referee agrees and books him.

Goal! Emanuel Emegha (Strasbourg) fires
home from very close range after latching
on to a pass from Dilane Bakwa. The score
is 0:2.

Emanuel Emegha (Strasbourg) is awarded a
yellow card.

summary.incident:
Mory Gbane (Reims) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Florent Batta had an easy-decision
to make.

Alexandre Dujeux is forced to make a change.
Jim Allevinah is unable to continue due
to injury, Farid El Melali (Angers) comes
on.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Buta (Reims) was quite harsh and Florent
Batta didn't hesitate to show him a yellow
card.

Farid El Melali (Angers) displays his brilliant
free kick ability. The ball flies towards
the goal and ends under the crossbar. What
a finish!

Samba Diawara has made a change at the break.
Oumar Diakite has come on in place of Mory
Gbane (Reims).

Half-time substitution. Nhoa Sangui (Reims)
is replaced by Amadou Kone.

The teams are back out for the second half
and here is a change on the pitch. Samba
Diawara gives a chance to Sekine Hiroki
and Buta (Reims) is off.

The referee gives a yellow card to Jean-Eudes
Aholou (Angers) for talking back. He must
be careful for the remainder of the match.

Oumar Diakite (Reims) doesn't keep his cool
and fails to convert the penalty. He skies
the ball way over the bar and into the stands.

Alexandre Dujeux decides to make a substitution.
Yassine Belkhdim (Angers) will be replaced
by Ibrahima Niane.

Here is a change. Valentin Atangana Edoa
is going off and Samba Diawara gives the
last tactical orders to Teddy Teuma (Reims).

It's time for a substitution. Sidiki Cherif
comes on in place of Zinedine Ferhat (Angers).

The game has come to an end for Esteban
Lepaul (Angers). He has contributed as much
as he could today. He will be replaced by
the fresh legs of Pierrick Capelle.

Georges Mikautadze (Lyon) receives the ball
inside the box, reacts quickly and without
any problems stabs the ball low inside the
left post.

Tanguy Coulibaly (Montpellier) takes his
opponent down and receives a yellow card
from the referee.

Andy Delort (Montpellier) goes into the
referee's book for dissent.

Goal! Tanguy Coulibaly (Montpellier) fires
home from very close range after latching
on to a pass from Teji Savanier. The score
is 1:1.

It's a goal! Ernest Nuamah (Lyon) scores
with a brilliant shot into the left side
of the goal after being released inside
the box by a superb lofted pass from Nemanja
Matic. The score is now 1:2.

Corentin Tolisso (Lyon) scores a beautiful
goal. He climbs high to meet a cross and
finds the back of the net with a bullet
header that goes into the bottom left corner.

Jean-Louis Gasset has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Khalil Fayad (Montpellier)
replacing Rabby Nzingoula.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Abdoul Bamo Meite leaves
the pitch and Kiki Kouyate (Montpellier)
comes on.

Yellow card. Nicolas Tagliafico (Lyon) goes
into the book for a bad tackle on his opponent.

Here's the change. Tanguy Coulibaly (Montpellier)
leaves the pitch and Nicolas Pays comes
on as a substitute.

The game has come to an end for Jordan Ferri
(Montpellier). He has contributed as much
as he could today. He will be replaced by
the fresh legs of Junior Ndiaye.

Today's match ends for Andy Delort (Montpellier)
who will be replaced by Wahbi Khazri.

That will be all from Rayan Cherki (Lyon)
who is being replaced by the fresh legs
of Thiago Almada.

Paulo Fonseca prepares a substitution. Nicolas
Tagliafico (Lyon) is replaced by Abner Vinicius.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Georges Mikautadze (Lyon)
departs the field of play to be replaced
by Alexandre Lacazette.

It's in the back of the net! Abner Vinicius
plays it into the box, and Alexandre Lacazette
(Lyon) gets on the end of the cross to put
it into the back of the net. 1:4.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Jordan Veretout (Lyon)
is coming onto the pitch as Nemanja Matic
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Malick Fofana (Lyon)
will replace Corentin Tolisso.

Theo Sainte-Luce (Montpellier) is shown
a yellow card by the referee for making
a challenge on his opponent, but he looks
angry with the decision.

Vincent Sierro (Toulouse) is awarded a yellow
card for his behaviour.

Carles Martinez is forced to make an unplanned
substitution as Guillaume Restes suffers

on.

Goal! Fabian Ruiz (PSG) was in the right

the ball home. It's 0:1.

Willy Delajod shows a yellow card to Umit
Akdag (Toulouse) for a tough tackle.

The referee signals a substitution. Vitinha
(PSG) is brought on as a substitute for
Fabian Ruiz.

Luis Enrique has decided to substitute Willian
Pacho and he is replaced by Marquinhos (PSG).

It's time for a substitution. Ousmane Dembele
(PSG) comes on in place of Kang-In Lee.

Here is a change. Frank Magri is going off
and Carles Martinez gives the last tactical
orders to Rafik Messali (Toulouse).

Here's the change. Vincent Sierro leaves
the pitch and Mark McKenzie (Toulouse) comes
on as a substitute.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Goncalo Ramos (PSG) comes
onto the pitch so that Bradley Barcola can
be given a rest.

Here comes a substitution. Shavy Babicka
is given a rest as he is replaced by Noah
Edjouma (Toulouse).

Carles Martinez has decided to make a change.
Djibril Sidibe (Toulouse) replaces Umit
Akdag.

That will be all from Senny Mayulu who is
being replaced by the fresh legs of Joao
Neves (PSG).

Goal! A precise cut back on the goal line
from Moses Simon finds Matthis Abline (Nantes)
right in front of goal, and he easily buries
the ball into the bottom left corner. 0:1.

Nicolas Cozza (Nantes) makes a horrific
tackle on his opponent and is shown a straight
red card by the referee!

Goal! Mika Biereth (Monaco) finds himself
some space inside the box to get on the
end of a pass from Takumi Minamino, then
sends the ball into the bottom left corner.
1:1.

Takumi Minamino (Monaco) receives a killer
pass, finds himself one-on-one with the
goalkeeper and coolly sends the ball into
the back of the net.

Matthis Abline (Nantes) is awarded a yellow
card for a sharp discussion with the referee.
He should relax or he could be sent off.

Half-time substitution. Antoine Kombouare
decided to make a change. Jean-Charles Castelletto
is replaced by Marcus Coco (Nantes).

Eliesse Ben Seghir (Monaco) receives the
ball inside the box, reacts quickly and
without any problems stabs the ball low
inside the left post.

Goal! Mika Biereth (Monaco) was in the right
place at the right time to get to the rebound
inside the box and gleefully rifles the
ball into the right side of the goal. It's
4:1.

Substitution. Takumi Minamino walks off
the pitch and George Ilenikhena (Monaco)
comes on as a substitute.

Adi Hutter decides to make a substitution.
Lamine Camara will be replaced by Al Musrati
(Monaco).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Krepin Diatta (Monaco) replaces
Vanderson.

Goal! Mika Biereth (Monaco) runs up to the
ball, stops and waits for Anthony Lopes
to commit before slotting the penalty into
the top left corner.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Moses Simon will be replaced by Meschack
Elia (Nantes).

Here is a change. Matthis Abline is going
off and Antoine Kombouare gives the last
tactical orders to Mostafa Mohamed (Nantes).

A substitution has been made. Douglas Augusto
is replaced by Bahereba Guirassy (Nantes).

Although Antoine Kombouare (Nantes) is just
on the bench, Thomas Leonard has awarded
him with a yellow card. Unsporting behavior
says the referee.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Maghnes Akliouche walks off the pitch
to be replaced by Lucas Michal (Monaco).

Goal! Caio Henrique hands George Ilenikhena
(Monaco) the simplest of tasks from close
range after the cross evaded the keeper,
and he makes no mistake with his header
into the bottom right corner. 6:1.

It's time for a substitution. Mamadou Coulibaly
(Monaco) comes on in place of Mika Biereth.

Denis Zakaria (Monaco) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Thomas Leonard had an
easy-decision to make.

Antoine Kombouare prepares a substitution.
Pedro Chirivella is replaced by Louis Leroux
(Nantes).

Spectacular goal! George Ilenikhena (Monaco)
brilliantly darts into the box to latch
on to a cross and buries the ball into the
bottom right corner, leaving the goalkeeper
stunned!

The goal by Marseille is DISALLOWED on the
advice of the video assistant referee due
to a foul.

Lucas Stassin (St Etienne) picks up a yellow
card for a foul.

What a beauty from just outside the box!
Amine Gouiri (Marseille) lashed the ball
with incredible pace and power into the
top right corner.

Eirik Horneland makes a switch. Irvin Cardona
(St Etienne) is coming on in place of Augustine
Boakye at the start of the second period.

Goal! Mason Greenwood (Marseille) wins the
battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty past Gautier Larsonneur into left
side of the goal.

Goal! Michael Murillo (Marseille) was in
the right place at the right time to get
to the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball into the right side of the
goal. It's 3:0.

Goal! Amine Gouiri (Marseille) picks up
a pass and gets to the edge of the box before
clipping a brilliant lob over the goalkeeper
and into the empty net. He makes it 4:0.

Eirik Horneland prepares a substitution.
Benjamin Bouchouari is replaced by Louis
Mouton (St Etienne).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Quentin Merlin trots off
the pitch and is replaced by Amar Dedic
(Marseille).

Roberto De Zerbi has decided to make a change.
Valentin Rongier (Marseille) replaces Ismael
Bennacer.

Abdelatif Kherradji shows a yellow card
to Derek Cornelius (Marseille) for a tough
tackle.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Mason Greenwood departs
the field of play to be replaced by Bilal
Nadir (Marseille).

Roberto De Zerbi has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Geoffrey Kondogbia (Marseille)

Goal! Adrien Rabiot (Marseille) fires home

to a pass from Amar Dedic. The score is
5:0.

Fantastic team goal! Lucas Stassin (St Etienne)
was set free in the area by Irvin Cardona
and fired low past Geronimo Rulli. 5:1.

Substitution. Florian Tardieu makes his
way off the pitch and Lamine Fomba (St Etienne)

Roberto De Zerbi has decided to substitute
Amine Gouiri and he is replaced by Jonathan

GOAL! A cross into the box is headed down

Eric Roy is forced to make a change. Ibrahim
Salah (Brest) is unable to continue due
to injury, Mama Balde comes on.

Mama Balde (Brest) is rightly booked by
the referee because it could not have been
anything other than a yellow card.

Clement Akpa (Auxerre) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Bastien Dechepy had an
easy-decision to make.

The referee looks satisfied after his VAR
review and duly disallows the goal for offside.
The Brest players look gutted.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Christophe Pelissier probably
wasn't satisfied with the performance of
Hamed Junior Traore. He is replaced by Ado
Onaiwu (Auxerre).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Mahdi Camara leaves the
pitch and Pierre Lees-Melou (Brest) comes

Eric Roy has decided to substitute Hugo
Magnetti and he is replaced by Abdallah
Sima (Brest).

Goal! Abdoulaye Ndiaye (Brest) was in the

the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball low inside the left post.
It's 1:1.

The substitution has been made. Kevin Danois
(Auxerre) has replaced Theo Bair.

Abdoulaye Ndiaye (Brest) has tested the
patience of referee Bastien Dechepy and
goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

Goal! Gaetan Perrin (Auxerre) fires the
rebound into the bottom left corner after
the ball breaks to him in the box. The score
is 1:2.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Romain Faivre (Brest)
comes onto the pitch so that Kamory Doumbia
can be given a rest.

Here is a change. Justin Bourgault is going
off and Eric Roy gives the last tactical
orders to Luc Zogbe (Brest).

GOAL! Ludovic Ajorque (Brest) scores with

path. It's 2:2.

Problems for Christophe Pelissier as Ki-Jana
Hoever is not able to play anymore. His
injury is too serious and Ange Loic N'Gatta

The manager makes a subsitution with Assane
Diousse (Auxerre) coming on for Han-Noah
Massengo.

Christophe Pelissier has decided to introduce

Assane Diousse (Auxerre) receives a yellow

Leonardo Balerdi (Marseille) receives a
yellow card from the referee as expected.

Adrien Rabiot (Marseille) is booked for
saying more than Hakim Ben El Hadj Salem
was willing to tolerate.

Jean-Eudes Aholou (Angers) is given a fully

Alexandre Dujeux is forced to make an unplanned
substitution as Haris Belkebla suffers an

Here comes a substitution. Farid El Melali
is given a rest as he is replaced by Zinedine
Ferhat (Angers).

Here is a change. Quentin Merlin is going
off and Roberto De Zerbi gives the last
tactical orders to Neal Maupay (Marseille).

We are about to witness a substitution.
Geoffrey Kondogbia (Marseille) is replacing
Ismael Bennacer.

Adrien Rabiot (Marseille) outjumps the defence
inside the six-yard box to meet the corner
and scores with a great header into the
bottom left corner. The keeper had no chance
to react. The score is now 0:1.

It's in the back of the net! Amine Gouiri
picks out Neal Maupay (Marseille) with a
sweet pass, and he latches on to it deep
inside the box and beats the goalkeeper.
0:2.

Substitution. Mason Greenwood is replaced
by Bilal Nadir (Marseille).

Alexandre Dujeux has decided to make a change.
Pierrick Capelle (Angers) replaces Jean-Eudes
Aholou.

The referee signals a substitution. Amar
Dedic (Marseille) is brought on as a substitute
for Amine Gouiri.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Esteban Lepaul walks off the pitch to
be replaced by Ibrahima Niane (Angers).

Alexandre Dujeux has decided to substitute
Florent Hanin and he is replaced by Jacques
Ekomie (Angers).

Problems for Carles Martinez as Joshua King
is not able to play anymore. His injury
is too serious and Frank Magri (Toulouse)

Carles Martinez has made a change at the
break. Vincent Sierro (Toulouse) has come
on in place of Mark McKenzie.

The game has come to an end for Florian
Aye. He has contributed as much as he could
today. He will be replaced by the fresh
legs of Lassine Sinayoko (Auxerre).

Goal! The ball is swung into the box from

Junior (Auxerre), who jumps highest and

Substitution. Paul Joly (Auxerre) replaces
Ki-Jana Hoever.

Christophe Pelissier decides to make a substitution.
Han-Noah Massengo will be replaced by Kevin
Danois (Auxerre).

Goal! The corner is whipped in and Charlie
Cresswell (Toulouse) is in the right place

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Zakaria Aboukhlal trots

Goal! Hamed Junior Traore (Auxerre) picks

it 2:1.

Jerome Brisard shows a yellow card to Hamed
Junior Traore (Auxerre) for a tough tackle.

The substitution has been made. Warren Kamanzi
(Toulouse) has replaced Rafik Messali.

Christophe Pelissier has decided to substitute

Diousse (Auxerre).

Here's the change. Hamed Junior Traore leaves

Frank Magri (Toulouse) violates the rules

Noah Edjouma (Toulouse) receives a killer

Jeremy Stinat shows a yellow card to Modibo

Goal! Emanuel Emegha (Strasbourg) fires

The score is 1:0.

Half-time substitution. Jean-Louis Gasset
decided to make a change. Modibo Sagnan
(Montpellier) is replaced by Yael Mouanga.

Becir Omeragic (Montpellier) is substituted

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Nicolas Pays (Montpellier)

Here comes a substitution. Wahbi Khazri
(Montpellier) is brought on as a substitute
for Andy Delort.

Sebastian Nanasi (Strasbourg) receives a
delightful pass inside the box and smashes
a low shot into the bottom left corner.
What a clinical finish!

Abdoul Bamo Meite (Montpellier) is booked
after bringing down an opponent. Jeremy
Stinat had an easy-decision to make.

Guela Doue (Strasbourg) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Valentin Barco.

Jean-Louis Gasset has decided to substitute
Abdoul Bamo Meite and he is replaced by
Jordan Ferri (Montpellier).

the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball low inside the right post.
It's 1:1.

in the clear with just the keeper to beat.
He takes his shot early from the edge of
the box and scores beautifully low into
the middle of the goal. 2:1.

inside the penalty area. He sends the ball
precisely into the bottom right corner and
makes it 5:0. Gautier Larsonneur was helpless.

Fantastic team goal! Youssoufa Moukoko (Nice)
was set free in the area by Evann Guessand

into the bottom left corner. 6:0.

Goal! Abdoulaye Toure (Le Havre) wins the

right corner.

Leo Ostigard (Rennes) outjumps the defence
inside the six-yard box to meet the corner
and scores with a great header into the
bottom left corner. The keeper had no chance
to react. The score is now 0:1.

Buta (Reims) is awarded a yellow card for
his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with
the decision, but Mathieu Vernice ignores
the protests.

Yaya-Kader Fofana sends a superb cross into
the box. Junya Ito (Reims) latches on to
it and from close range plants a header
into the bottom left corner, leaving Steve
Mandanda beaten. He displayed his eye for
goal there - excellent finish. The score
is 1:1.

Goal! Junya Ito picks out Oumar Diakite
(Reims) in the box with a decent cross,
and he scores in the left side of the goal
with a header from close range. 2:1.

A yellow card for a tackle by Adrien Truffert
(Rennes). Mathieu Vernice doesn't hesitate

Here is a change. Arnaud Kalimuendo is going

Alidu Seidu (Rennes) is replacing Adrien

Hans Hateboer will be replaced by Lorenz

That's the end of the game for Buta, who

Ruben Aguilar (Lens) is booked after bringing

Let's see what they create from this.

What was Florian Sotoca (Lens) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee

A substitution has been made. Anass Zaroury

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Adi Hutter has decided to introduce fresh

Remy Labeau Lascary (Lens) shouldn't be

Here comes the VAR verdict. NO GOAL for

The referee signals that it is time for

A perfectly taken corner kick. Denis Zakaria

from around the penalty spot into the top
left corner, increasing the score of today's
match â€“ 1:0.

Jhoanner Chavez will be replaced by Martin

GOAL! Thatâ€™s a great strike from the spot
by Przemyslaw Frankowski (Lens) low into
the left of the net, giving goalkeeper Philipp
Kohn no chance!

summary.incident:
Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg (Marseille) receives
a yellow card for infringement.

Fabulous goal. Mason Greenwood (Marseille)
collects an exquisite pass and subsequently
produces a snap shot from edge of the box
which flies into the back of the net off
the right post.

Goal! After receiving a sweet pass, Mason
Greenwood (Marseille) unleashes a shot straight
into the bottom right corner. Good team
effort!

You can see a deep sadness in the eyes of
Frank Magri (Toulouse) as he leaves the
pitch after receiving a red card.

Stephanie Frappart shows the yellow card
to Cristian Casseres (Toulouse) for a heavy
challenge.

Aron Donnum (Toulouse) picks up a yellow
card for a foul.

It's an own goal! Charlie Cresswell (Toulouse)
puts the ball into his own net.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Charlie Cresswell walks off the pitch
to be replaced by Djibril Sidibe (Toulouse).

Carles Martinez prepares a substitution.
Cristian Casseres is replaced by Shavy Babicka
(Toulouse).

It is time for a substitution. Warren Kamanzi
(Toulouse) is on for Zakaria Aboukhlal.

It will be a substitution. Jonathan Rowe
(Marseille) is ready to enter the pitch
as Luis Henrique walks off.

Roberto De Zerbi has decided to substitute
Amine Harit and he is replaced by Valentin
Carboni (Marseille).

The foul by Lilian Brassier (Marseille)

shown by Stephanie Frappart.

Shavy Babicka (Toulouse) is awarded a yellow

agree with the decision, but Stephanie Frappart
ignores the protests.

The referee stops play so that a substitution

(Marseille).

Geronimo Rulli is stranded way out of his
goal after his team loses possession and
Shavy Babicka (Toulouse) has the simplest
of tasks to shoot the ball into an empty
net from distance. Itâ€™s now 1:3.

Goal! Tino Kadewere finds Matthis Abline

Fantasy football! 0:1.

Goal! Akor Adams (Montpellier) was in the

the rebound inside the box and gleefully

net. It's 1:1.

Goal! Moses Simon (Nantes) wins the battle

the goal.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Khalil Fayad (Montpellier) is replacing
Mousa Al-Tamari.

Michel Der Zakarian prepares a substitution.
Tanguy Coulibaly is replaced by Wahbi Khazri

Today's match ends for Sorba Thomas who
will be replaced by Kelvin Amian (Nantes).

Antoine Kombouare has decided to make a
change. Mostafa Mohamed (Nantes) replaces
Matthis Abline.

Marcus Coco (Nantes) goes into the book

Jordan Ferri (Montpellier) can count himself

It's a goal! Mahdi Camara (Brest) gets on

The score has changed to 1:0.

This is a yellow card! Lamine Fomba (St
Etienne) is not happy with the decision,
but from our point of view it was clear.

Goal! Romain Del Castillo (Brest) runs up

Abner (Lyon) has tested the patience of

3:3.

Sekou Mara (Strasbourg) replaces Sebastian

Adryelson (Lyon) gives the referee no choice

The referee is firm and issues Gift Orban

Goal - 1:0! Amine Harit (Marseille) receives

The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet

His attempt was beyond the reach of Geronimo

Goal - 1:0! Jhoanner Chavez (Lens) receives

summary.incident:

A yellow card for a tackle by Clinton Mata

Lamine Camara (Monaco) is awarded a second
yellow by Stephanie Frappart and subsequently
dismisses him with a red one.

Bradley Barcola (PSG) displayed brilliant
individual skill before finding himself
in a great position to strike from inside

went in off the right post, leaving Benjamin
Lecomte stranded. The score sheet now reads
1:0.

Goal! Joao Neves plays a pass to the feet

box. It's 2:0.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
